name: Studio in Historic Downtown Bldg w/Prime Parking
description: Comfortable studio apartment in an historic registry building.  Parking across the street is included.  Cable TV and internet.   Full kitchen.  Perfect location for convention center activities.  Convenient to grocery stores and restaurants.  Beach is within walking distance.  Metro to Los Angeles is two blocks away.  Long Beach Bike Share available nearby.  Uber friendly.  The historic nature of the building does not allow for air conditioners. This is a private unit.  The entrance is at 19 Linden which is around the corner from Ocean Blvd.  There is a security panel outside the door.  The access code is 002.  You will be buzzed in.  Please call (or (Hidden by Airbnb) ) at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) for an estimated time you will be arriving and a heads up before your arrival so Amber let you in. Amber is available for any questions or if you should need anything. The East Village Arts District has its avant-garde shops, galleries, and restaurants, many located in restored histor
neighborhood_overview: The East Village Arts District has its avant-garde shops, galleries, and restaurants, many located in restored historic buildings. Though the borders of the East Village are not strictly defined, the area is centered in the southeast portion of downtown, roughly between Long Beach Boulevard on the west and Alamitos Avenue on the east, and Ocean Boulevard on the south to 7th Street on the north. Visitors will find unique dining options like Utopia, James Republic, Super Mex and the Breakfast Bar to enjoy along with plenty of local shops. Shoreline Village, with the Yardhouse, Gladstone etc is within walking distance as well as Pine Avenue with the Rockbottom Brewery
transit: The Metro system is two blocks away.  You can get to downtown Los Angeles and transfer to Santa Monica, Hollywood and other locations on the Metro.  The local bus runs to Belmont Shore (#121) as well as other buses.  Uber is very easy.  Convention Center is two blocks away.  Restaurants and bars are within walking distance.

name: Welcome Inn - Near Everything!
description: *** Due to new rules for short term hosting in LA I now offer longer stays only. If you are planning an extended academic or executive stay in Los Angeles, this will be a great location to consider. If you need a longer-term stay, just drop me a note. During your stay please be sure to let me know if you do not see something in your room that is offered in my listing or if you have any questions or problems. I want your stay with me to be the best it can be, but I can't read your mind. This is your own room in a beautiful eclectic home, everyone says it has a European vibe. You will have use a shared unattached bathroom with a shower and tub over looking the garden as well as use of the public spaces in the house, unless there is a guest on the sofa (but there are several sitting areas in the garden to compensate)  this is a big house so there are other rooms too! Your room has a comfy settee, television with streaming video and TV content via Hulu Plus and Netflix among others, WiFi,
neighborhood_overview: This is the La Brea District and it is filled with galleries, restaurants and boutiques. I have a rather extensive Guidebook that I suggest you look over for some of my recommendations and to get an idea of what is here in the neighborhood.
transit: Mass Transit is available via bus and Metro or taxi and you can also use Lyft or Uber. Using buses is easy from here, but I recommend that you have a car or use UBER or Lyft. Los Angeles is huge and you want to get a bunch done while you are here and a car will help you do that. I offer a guest parking pass so you can park on my block.

name: Private Room with Queen bed in Hollywood, CA
description: This is a private room with a Queen size bed and a shared bathroom and a shared kitchen in a house.  FREE parking, FREE internet, and FREE coffee/tea.  Located in the heart of Hollywood, Melrose Inn offers affordable luxurious accommodations on Melrose Avenue, in Los Angeles, California.  All guest rooms offer flat screen TVs, heating, mini-fridge in the room, and luxurious linens and towels.  Complimentary coffee and tea provided in your room.  Just minutes from Universal Studios! These complimentary items will be provided for to make your stay even more special:) Complimentary free parking provided on premises based on availability.  Complimentary personal recommendations and guides from the host. Complimentary iron and ironing board provided in guest room for use during stay. Complimentary assorted flavored coffees and teas in yo

transit: Uber is always best. Here is some local travel tips from me! City of Angels, City of Dreams, City streets lined with palm trees under a dazzling blue sky.  Convertible cars cruising Coast Highway.  Surfers riding a perfect wave.  Movie stars leading mythological lives in designer gowns.  Welcome to Los Angeles, California. Whether you're coming for one day or for a week, I'll tell you the best of everything the city has to offer from iconic places such as Hollywood to the amazing Disneyland Resort.  I would like to give you tips like seeking out what is free to avoiding the crowds, plus helping you plan an easy itinerary designed to tie together a clutch of sights in a short space of time.  I hope you enjoy my tips! Two Days in Los Angeles Itinerary: Day 1 Morning: Start the day on Historic Hollywood Boulevard just minutes from the property.  The TCL Chinese Theatre, where you can step among the footprints of the stars.  From Hollywood & Highland Center, spot the famous Hollywood Sign.

All the bathrooms except one are step free and disable accessible. The property is one story dwelling which sits on a huge lot in the prime middle upper income neighborhood in the city of Tarzana, CA, part of Los Angeles county. Our property is unique as it used to be an assisted living facility  (operated by previous owners), one story 7 bed 6.5 bath 3,000 sq. ft dwelling, spacious and convenient designed for seniors/elderly people. However after our home has undergone extensive renovation and update,  looks modern and lovely akin to  a nice hotel with several secured rooms. Our guests can access all the 6 bedrooms with attached private bathrooms (5 en suite baths) and one half bath outside the bedrooms, gourmet kitchen and di
neighborhood_overview: We are delighted to welcome you to this desirable neighborhood in the city of Tarzana, CA, part of Los Angeles county. If you go south/southeast less than a mile, you hit the upscale Ventura Boulevard where numerous restaurants, sushi bars, shops and Whole Foods are found. About 2 miles east of Tarzana is city of Encino, an equally upscale upper income neighborhood. Whereas if you go southwest or west of Ventura Blvd, you'll reach Woodland Hills where you can find numerous fine dining places or restaurants. There are several Starbucks coffee shops on Ventura Blvd.
transit: Our property is centrally located close to public transportation and easy access to major freeways. It is within 20 to 30 minutes drive to most famous tourist spots in Los Angeles area.

name: The Echo Suite
description: Private hotel-style apartment with separate entrance. Stocked with linens, soaps and basic amenities. Our home and your unit share a wall, so we only host quiet guests.  If you are a bit noisy or looking to party and come back late, this is not a good choice for you. We only accept bookings from people who are actually staying (not booking for others). We leave for work at 6am M-F, so in the mornings you may hear some noise through the ceiling, including a hair dryer and blender. Panoramic views of Elysian Park palm trees, your space shares the street gate entrance with the property owners, but you have your own completely private apartment with private entrance.   This apartment does not have a full kitchen, but does include microwave, medium-size fridge, and full amenities.   Amazing proximity to Elysian Park, shops and restaurants on Sunset Blvd and Echo Park Lake. Dodger Stadium is less than 1 mile away and within walking distance. Please note that only your apartment is included i
neighborhood_overview: This is a quiet neighborhood but literally around the corner from vibrant Sunset Blvd.  The unit is off the street so it is very quiet compared to other properties in the area.  Please keep noise to a minimum while on-site and respect the neighbors.
transit: Parking is generally available on the street just outside the property, but during festivals, Dodger games, and other events in the neighborhood it can be sparse, and you may need to park a block or two away.  Hiking in Elysian Park within walking distance.  One the the most hip areas in Los Angeles all around you with venues, restaurants, bars and more!

name: DT Long Beach Convention Ctr BEACH washer dryer AC
description: This beautiful beach/downtown condo has recently been remodeled with new countertops, fresh paint and new furnishings. This 1 bedroom home comfortably sleeps 5 with a full kitchen, bathroom, washer & dryer. The kitchen is fully stocked with cooking and serving ware, includes a refrigerator, stove, microwave, , garbage disposal and coffee maker. Walk down to the beach, Long Beach Convention Center or go downtown just a few blocks away. This recently remodeled condo is located in a gated complex and has new furnishings, including a queen size bed, queen size sofa bed, single rollaway bed, and two flat screen Smart HDTV's, one in the living room and one in the bedroom. There’s a washer, dryer, high speed WiFi internet, a coffee maker and bathroom with separate shower. Walking distance from the beach and blocks away from downtown shopping and restaurants. This studio is close to 710 freeway, 22 freeway, 405 freeway and 605 freeway, and just blocks away from Long Beach Convention and Entert
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of sunny Southern California, Long Beach blends urban sophistication with the relaxed atmosphere of a beachside community. Discover world-class attractions like the Long Beach Aquarium of the Pacific and the Queen Mary, cutting-edge museums, award-winning restaurants and a thriving, multi-faceted arts and culture scene. Whether you’re visiting Long Beach, California for business, fun or both, you’ll always find something unconventional to do. Satisfy your inner urbanite at downtown Long Beach’s vibrant waterfront scene. From eclectic neighborhoods to sandy beaches, you’ll find Long Beach to be an urban waterfront playground. Visit museums, tour a 1930s ocean liner and watch sea lions at Long Beach’s aquarium.  Enjoy live performances and cruise Naples canals. Spot dolphins at play on your way to Catalina Island. Or take a short jaunt to Disneyland, Universal Studios Hollywood, or other Southern California attractions.
transit: Like most beach towns, parking can be congested.  I recommend parking your car before 3pm. Then walk or use Uber/Lyft to get around. The beach is walking distance. Downtown Pine St and the Convention Center are only a half mile away.

Come visit me in the studio and see what I'm working on. I'm a wild and wacky California artist inspired by the creative spirit. My steampunk, zen, jungle art is everywhere which can both dazzle and inspire you. It's through creativity that we become magically unique and immersing yourself with the creative spirit can lead to deep happiness with one's self. Feel free to use the kitchen, fridge, stove, backyard, bathroom but the private bedrooms are off limits. I'm in the back studio most of the time working on art, video, music and animation projects. name: Beach Bungalow with Mar Vista charm
description: Located on a quiet residential street in the heart of Mar Vista. Set on a large 7,500 square foot lot with beautiful backyard. Comfortable for two to four persons.  Other amenities include Bathroom with Shower and separate Bathtub, Kitchen (fully equipped with cooking and eating utensils), Gas Stove, Oven, Microwave, Coffee Maker, Washer and Dryer, HD-TV (Apple TV - Netflix, HBO, Showtime, Hulu and Cable), WiFi, Two Queen Beds, Linens and Towels, Private Backyard with Sitting and Eating Area and Firepit/Grill.  Centrally located to Venice Beach, Santa Monica, Marina del Rey, UCLA, Century City, Culver City, and Pacific Coast Highway. Two bicycles available (about a 10 minute ride to Venice Beach). Also near Whole Foods Market, Trader Joe's and Abbott Kinney (Restaurants, Bars and Shopping). Full access to entire home and yard Guests can reach host by email or phone Notable restaurants and cafes: Status Kuo Louie's of Mar Vista Sweet Lucies  Mitsuwa Marketplace Earl's Gourmet Grub Venic

Minutes away from Downtown, Hollywood, Beverly Hills, UCLA, Venice Beach, and Santa Monica! Our modern apartment home was just finished being built in March 2017! *Must like dogs* We have 3 large breed dogs, all very friendly. * we do not recommend this place for parents traveling with their kids* Unfortunately, we regret we cannot host guests who are traveling with their pets Don't miss this fully furnished bedroom featuring a brand new queen size bed, beautiful dresser, large 45” Smart TV, with access to multiple streaming services, and news stations, side table, large closet, access to printer should you need to print anything. Enjoy ample street parking, shared bathroom, hair Dryer, washer/dryer, central air/heat, full kitchen, spacious closet, and private back patio area, Space in the kitchen to store food. Our guests are to please use the pedestrian gate to acc

The area is full of families, working professionals, and is part of the new upcoming West Adams/ Mid City - Heights.

name: Enjoy Best of LA & Beaches from Chic Art & Design Apartment // ARTBNB!
description: Dream big in this stylish, eco-friendly apartment full of warm, romantic touches and original art by recognized talents. Prepare a fresh California breakfast in the clean-white, fully equipped kitchen before heading out for work or a day in the sun.
neighborhood_overview: The building is next to a park in a quiet residential area in El Segundo. It's a great part of LA, without traffic. Shopping, dining, and lots of cool stuff are all nearby. Explore the beaches in Manhattan, Redondo, and Hermosa within an easy drive.
transit: Lots of options!  1) RENT a car with Turo! It's like airbnb for cars. You can also rent out your car while away. Typically cheaper than rental car places and you can pick exactly what you want! Convertibles/electric/XL. I'll give you a link for $25 OFF just let me know if you want it :) 2) TAXI - Uber and Lyft apps are what everyone uses in LA - they are INEXPENSIVE taxi services with FREE rides for first-time users. Sign up now to be ready to book when you arrive and get your first ride free: Lyft - free ride code for new customers: SOFIA800141 Uber - free ride code for new customers: UberSofiaUSA 3) Public transport - bus to/from LAX 15mins. Nearby bus stops and Metro can also take you wherever you need to be - but not recommended for ladies traveling alone. LA public transport is not the best.

name: Downtown L.A-Lifestyle like you live here¡
description: Centrally located on the edge of the Fashion District of downtown Los Angeles, in a secured building. Enjoy a gourmet kitchen. The loft offers easy access to the trend setting urban lifestyle just beyond your doorstep. Our community offers an exclusive rooftop with incomparable views of Downtown Los Angeles. A fully equipped gym, media room with old fashioned arcade games and business center. We are centrally located to an exciting variety of shopping, eateries, entertainment and transportation. It's a unique layout.  An open space w separation. Semi-Private Room w drapery closing off the space.  The rented guest area includes a bunk bed,  work space and dresser. Host lives in unit as well in separate draped off area. We have "Crane's Bar" in Vault (basement).  It's a historic building use to be a bank in the 1920s.  We have a tapas restaurant in the basement as well. Residents have our own exclusive access to the basement. On the same corner a renowned restaurant "Terroni's", Italian
neighborhood_overview: We have "ART WALK" once a month on Thursdays, basically an event that stretches many blocks on Spring Street. City Hall, Tourist areas, LA LIVE, STAPLES CENTER, Convention Center is walking distance. Not far from USC and Coliseum.
transit: metro, subway, commuter buses,  centrally located in a nice clean part of downtown....walking distance to everywhere really. There's public bike rental throughout downtown. Metered and lot parking.

name: STUDIO APARTMENT NESTLED IN THE STUDIO CITY HILLS
description: Self contained guest unit nestled in the base of Studio City Hills within walking distance of the heart of Ventura Blvd and moments from Universal Studios, Millennium Dance Studios and the Hollywood Bowl. Studio apartment with private entrance and garden area, situated beneath the main house with one Queen bed and large ensuite bathroom. The Studio is typical Cali boho decor, with coffee station, large fridge and Netflix. There is also a large private patio area to hang out on outside the studio. Please be aware that we do have dogs and the studio is situated beneath our kitchen and living area, so you may hear barking and some noise from the main house. Situated below the main house the studio apartment has a private entrance along the side of the house with ensuite bathroom and your own private garden area. There is always loads of free on street parking in front of the house and Ubers generally arrive within 4-5 minutes. Me and my wife are always happy to help if you need recommenda
neighborhood_overview: Set in the Studio City Hills, we are located in peaceful tree lined streets, but minutes away from the happenings of Ventura blvd, Universal Studios, Citywalk, Millennium Dance Studios and a 15 minute cab ride to West Hollywood and Beverly Hills.  Malibu and Venice beaches are both about 35 minutes away.
transit: Its a short 5 minute walk to Ventura blvd (famously known as the Sushi Mile) and all the bars and restaurants it has to offer. Universal Studios and Universal Studios Citywalk is less than 5 minutes drive and Lyfts’ generally arrive within 3-5 minutes of booking them. There is lots of free on street parking outside should you have your own vehicle. We are also within walking distance of Millenium Dance Complex and have a lot of dancers stay with us for longer term stays.

name: Casa de Viaje
description: Brand new 1 bedroom back house with shared brand new pool/swim up bar/jacuzzi Brand new back house (Completed December 2018) with vaulted ceilings, Calcutta bathroom, custom made floating wood shelves, custom mirrored closets with custom built ins, stainless slate appliances. The unit is a one bedroom with a queen bed and an 8' ft sofa for an extra guest or a queen air mattress for two.  The back house has a 34' wide deck with a cozy bench to enjoy and of course the swim up bar in our beautiful pool and a baja pool to soak and enjoy the bubbles.  We have a custom cornhole and giant jenga to enjoy! You have a private parking spot with your own private entry. Guests are more than welcome to enjoy their 36' wide deck along with our shared backyard. We have had some guests who want to come and BBQ with us and then others that barely see us and us them. Totally your call. :-) Our neighborhood is Mayberry meets up and coming with its small town feel and easy access to walk around yet our res
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is Mayberry meets up and coming with its small town feel and easy access to walk around yet our restaurants are all over the latest foody magazines. We really couldn't ask for more!

name: Same block as Ocean +2 blocks to Abbot Kinney + SM
description: Location and Charm! Stay in a true California Beach Bungalow located just 1 minute from the sand. You will be near everything - 2 blocks to Santa Monica, 1 block to all the restaurants, shops and bars on Main Street in Santa Monica, 1 block to Rose Ave and just 3 blocks to Abbot Kinney. This super charming beach bungalow has its original wood floors, lots of natural light, and a huge kitchen! Please note you are booking a Private room, other areas are shared. There are 3 rooms in our house  so you will be staying with  another Airbnb'ers!  This home is a super cool beach bungalow that gives you the true Venice experience and is worth almost 2 million dollars because of its prime location (we are on the same block as the ocean). This house has been featured in countless magazines and was once home to Jim Morrison's girlfriend, Pam. There are no shared walls with the house next to us and the house even has two entrances (front + back) so you may not even ever see any of the other guests
neighborhood_overview: You can walk to everywhere from here! Santa Monica is 2 blocks away, the sand is 1 block, tons of restaurants, shops, bars and outdoor activities are right outside the door. I have put together a great "Guidebook" located on this Airbnb listing. See this for tons of ideas on where to go and what things to do!
transit: The house boasts a 97 walkability score with the beach Boardwalk, Abbot Kinney, Main Street in Santa Monica and Rose Avenue all within 1-2 blocks. Additionally, Uber and Lyft take just minutes to arrive and the newly opened beach to DTLA subway is a 5-min Uber ride.

name: Hollywood Diamond - Silver Lake
description: n an effort to abide by new Los Angeles city law guidelines this property requires a 30-night minimum stay, after 21 nights the guest will have 2 options to choose from: 1. After 21 nights the guest will need to apply through our application process to continue their reservation in the same unit. OR 2. If they do not want to go through the application process they will need to comply with moving into a similar unit after 27 nights due to California tenant rights law. This is a peaceful non-smoking building. Great for short or long term stays. Includes Wifi, Cable TV, fully furnished, fully equipped kitchen, linens, towels, and on-site laundry facility. (Check the Amenities section, however, if you are looking for a specific amenity that is not already addressed, please feel free to ask me!) I do not provide any food perishables, pantry items, and soaps..etc., in order to avoid guest-to-guest contamination. (Read House Rules) PARKING: ONLY ONE Standard Size Parking Space available in pr
neighborhood_overview: Easy access to 101 Freeway! Many of my guests love how the unit is a very convenient walk to shops, restaurants and public transportation. Conveniently located near: the Greek Theatre, Griffith Park, Griffith Observatory, The Original Farmer's Market, The Grove, Runyon Canyon, The Broad, Chinatown & much more.
transit: Public transportation is all around you. Never more than a block away!

name: BRIGHT COMFY ROOM #R
description: My home is situated in the Westlake area of Koreatown, a short walk from the Metro lines! Universal Studios can be reached in 6 stops from this Metro! Downtown LA/USC/Echo Park/Silverlake are all about 10 minutes away by car! Hollywood in 15 minutes! Please be advised, street parking is very limited and there is no assigned parking  on premises. Finding parking at night is not an easy task. This is a new remodeled 3 bedroom townhouse. The space being offered for rent is a private bedroom. Guests will have access to all shared amenities. Including the kitchen and my clothes washer and dryer. This home is situated near the Wilshire Metro station, you can get almost anywhere from there. You can get to Universal Studios in about 25 minutes from this station. Ideally, my place is convenient to anyone wanting to explore DTLA or the eastside (hipster central) such as Los Feliz, Silverlake and Echo Park. You could also take one bus from here to the beach and it would take you about 45 minutes.
neighborhood_overview: I am next to the fun Koreatown nightlife. This is a vey fast developing area of LA with strong Korean and Mexican influences, There are also some amazing Korean restaurants and tacos nearby! Lots of cheap eats and pricey eats, you really have options! Downtown is less than 10 minutes away!
transit: LA is HUGE but, with public transportation nearby you can get to Hollywood, DTLA and the beach easily from here!

name: ⭐️Amazing 3 Bedroom/2 Bathroom House in Echo Park
description: We have a beautifully redecorated and refurnished 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom house available. Every room includes Two Full size beds with a small desk and closet. Perfect for Families or larger groups of friends! Located in the Echo Park neighborhood of Los Angeles, close to Historic Filipino Town and Angeleno Heights. We are walking distance to Echo Park Lake and a short 10 minute drive to Downtown LA with world-class dining and nightlife! This listing is for the entire lower floor of this house (with your own private entrance by keypad lock), including 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has its own private bathroom attached.  A spacious dining space and kitchen are also included. Note: There are no couches or TV's in the unit, because the unit is set up for individual room rentals and we like to encourage guests to go out and explore the beautiful city of Los Angeles! Guests can check-in via key code. On-site Parking is available on a limited basis because we have multiple lis
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the charming up-and-coming Echo Park neighborhood in Los Angeles. Walking distance to Echo Park Lake, short 10 minute drive to Downtown Los Angeles, 10 minutes to Dodger Stadium, and only 20 minutes to Hollywood. The 101 Freeway is only a 5 minutes drive away and we are very close to public transportation.
transit: Public Transportation is available by bus only two blocks away. Westlake / MacArthur Park Station is the Closest Metro Station (1.2 miles/ 1.9 km). LA's public transportation system is improving but still very much lacking.  I recommend using Uber or Lyft ride sharing services to get around town unless you are renting a car.

name: LA HIDEAWAY
description: You're going to love this charming 2 bedroom home on a hill - hidden behind a redwood fence, beneath a canopy of shade trees.  In for work?  You are centrally located to everything LA.  A desk is available for your computer.  The private patio is great place for a quiet meeting.  On vacation?  You are close to Universal, The Hollywood Bowl and more.  Want nature?  Hike trails around Lake Hollywood & The Hollywood Sign. Premium cable, HBO & Netflix.  Very fast Wi-fi.  24-hr self-check-in. You cannot see this home from the street. It is up a hill, set back, behind an 8 foot-tall fence - nestled beneath a canopy of shade trees.   Very few homes are as centrally located and equally private.  It's why we call it The Hideaway.  The moment you step inside this cozy, 50's cottage - with its eclectic mix of very comfortable furniture, artwork & posters on the walls, hand-made travertine counters & parquet hardwood floors - you’ll appreciate the love and care that has gone into this home.   Ever
neighborhood_overview: We are located in a great neighborhood in the center of Los Angeles, close to the 101 Freeway, the LA bus system, and the Metro Train Station.  You can walk to local cafes, restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops and more.   You are near Universal Studios, Warner Bros, The Hollywood Bowl, The Hollywood Walk of Fame and more.   If you're looking for nature, you have it here as well.  Hiking and jogging trails weave through the mountains surrounding Lake Hollywood and The Hollywood Sign – a peaceful setting that doesn't feel like you're in a city.  It’s truly the best of all worlds.
transit: There are many ways to get around LA.  Enterprise Car Rental is local and probably the best deal if you haven't your own car.   We provide two parking spaces at street level.  If you have guests we can fit extra cars.  Lyft and Uber are everywhere.  Metro Rail is great for going downtown to Little Tokoyo, Disney Hall and more.

name: Modern Venice home: Spanish style with large yard
description: Gorgeous, Spanish style house with very large yard and outdoor spaces nestled in a quiet and walkable neighborhood minutes from Abbot Kinney Blvd. We designed this home as a tranquil place to relax with family and friends. New chef's kitchen with high-end appliances, large flat-screen TV (HBO, Showtime, Netflix, Hulu). Outdoor shower, BBQ, fire pit, 3 outdoor dining areas, large patio. Private, sunny, comfortable, relaxed and open to the cool Pacific breeze. Surfboards and bicycles available. The large and private landscaped backyard with outdoor shower, lounge, seating and tables is the best way to enjoy California weather. Soak the sunshine, relax in the shade with a good book, have an outdoor dinner or make s'mores on the fire pit. String lights provide warmth and ambiance at night. You will enjoy this unique home, the large private yard and outdoor patio. There is a local contact person available, I can be reached via phone or e-mail. This home is located on a quiet street in Venic
neighborhood_overview: This home is located on a quiet street in Venice only minutes away from Abbot Kinney Blvd and the best Venice has to offer.  Restaurants, cafes, hip fashion boutiques, trendy bars, etc are within walking distance.  If you're looking for cool things to do in California, Venice offers a unique and vibrant mix of activities and attractions. Venice is one of the most popular destinations in Los Angeles for visitors and locals alike.
transit: Car, Lyft or Uber are recommended for getting around Los Angeles. There are many e-scooters and e-bikes available in the area close to the house. Public transport - buses - also available 1 block away.

name: Best Price, Best Location
description: Located just below the famous Sunset Strip and above BoysTown (5 min walk to the Abbey), this apt is perfectly located to make your Los Angeles trip amazing. Queen bed size sleeps 2, NEW Euro Lounger & Chaise sleep 2-3 more. Located just below the famous Sunset Strip (around the corner from the famed Viper Room) and above BoysTown (5 min walk to the Abbey), this apt is perfectly located to make your LA trip awesome. Queen size sleeps 2, pull out bed (full size) sleeps 1, lounger (twin size) sleeps 1. Large 1 bedroom apartment that can accommodate 2 in the queen size bed and 2-3 on the new sofa & lounger . Secured access gate. Courtyard with pool (think Melrose Place). Second level with small balcony and view. Fully stocked kitchen. name: Large Los Angeles Townhouse
description: We have enjoyed being Airbnb Hosts for some time now, and are excited to now also offer to make your experience a TRUE luxury Bed and Breakfast in the classic sense with some new and wonderful additions to our home and to the menu of amenities. While Los Angeles is known for overcrowding, horrific traffic and the "go go go", we are excited to welcome our guests to a TRULY serene bit of a paradise. You will be welcomed into a beautiful and sunny townhouse surrounded by trees and foliage with a view of the mountains. A gourmet kitchen with every amenity you could want awaits you, as you are greeted with our special homemade delicious guilt free cookies. Everyone is certain that our cookies have to be bad for you because they're so good... but in true LA style, your welcome cookies will have no more calories (and the same nutritional value) as a bowl of oatmeal (and MUCH more fun to eat!). You'll have the whole home to yourself, but if you opt for any of our luxury packages, we will be ve
neighborhood_overview: Woodland Hills and Calabasas (the neighboring town) is being called the new "Beverly Hills". It's very high end shopping and dining away from the crazy traffic and hassles of the Hollywood scene. The neighborhoods are filled with celebrities who have chosen to live there to get more space and a better quality of life. The air is cleaner. The hiking is SPECTACULAR! (Come visit the original set of the TV Show "Mash" as you hike up in the mountains towards Malibu). Many people think they need to be in Hollywood or Beverly Hills to get the "L.A. experience", but truly, that experience really just means being stuck in traffic and battling to get anywhere. The 30-60+ minutes it takes you to try to get even a 1/4 mile to your Hollywood accommodations from wherever you've been can be better spent (and less of it, with far fewer blood pressure spikes) driving into your tropical Palm Tree lined quiet resort. We can teach you the secrets to getting places in L.A. like the locals. For those lookin
transit: We are blocks away from the 101 Freeway, which will literally lead you directly to almost any place you need to go. Although public transportation is not a hugely popular thing in Los Angeles, we are even close to the fastest public transportation in the city (the new orange line). And you have the Chauffeur option as well if you want us to do the driving. Even BETTER, though, is that L.A.'s newest high end outdoor mall, the Village, is walking distance from our front door. At the Village you'll find incredible and famous restaurants, dance studios run by Dancing with the Stars Pro's, every high end shop you could ever want and more. It's a bit of a disservice to call it a "mall", because it feels more like Disney and the Four Seasons partnered up to create a shopping experience.

name: Mini Log Cabin - Silver Lake
description: n an effort to abide by new Los Angeles city law guidelines this property requires a 30-night minimum stay, after 21 nights the guest will have 2 options to choose from: 1. After 21 nights the guest will need to apply through our application process to continue their reservation in the same unit. OR 2. If they do not want to go through the application process they will need to comply with moving into a similar unit after 27 nights due to California tenant rights law. This is a peaceful non-smoking building. Great for short or long term stays. Includes: Wifi, TV w/Amazon Firestick (Netflix), linens, towels, and on-site laundry facility.  Kitchen: fridge, microwave, hot plate, and cooking + eating utensils. name: 在洛杉磯West Covina市,交通､採購都方便｡安靜,寬大停車位,能自由進出的平房後屋｡
description: 對旅行者來說,居房附近,生活機能好,交通方便,出入自由,安靜的環境等⋯都是很重要的,我家就有這些特性｡前院大,可停多輛車｡ 找吃的,到Azusa大馬路,左轉,車走3分鐘,Tokyo  Central日本超市,裏面什麼都有,熟食吧新鮮美味｡6分鐘,HomeDepot､Target､熊貓餐廳､銀行等,都在一片山上｡8分鐘,加油站､菲律賓超市,購物中心,BOA等,又集中在一起｡ 由Azusa大馬路,右轉,6分鐘,HK2香港超市,超市邊,有中越泰馬美等餐廳｡往下走,DMV､百貨公司､電影院､加油站､BOA銀行,都在那一帶! 對於｢背包客｣,走到Azusa Ave路口,是280的公車站牌,到公車總站近,轉車也方便｡ 我的房源,屬於袖珍型的,小而美,小而方便｡後院乾泳池邊,晚上能乘涼看星星;白天,可借用烤肉架,補給旅途中需要的能量,還準備了鍋碗瓢盆,可借用｡只要用完清乾淨並歸位｡ 我的小狗孫子,不會跑到客人房;幾隻貓,在後院歡迎您!您有小寵物,歡迎!沒寵物的訪客,請不用擔心房源的清潔,每位訪客退租後,我都會清得很乾淨的｡ 最後,歡迎大家來我家,祝大家旅途順利,渡假愉快! 謝謝你們! 我家這條街進來,右邊的房子都屬地大､院大的房,所以與鄰居的空間夠,安靜,舒服｡ 前､後院､小烤箱､微波爐｡ 不會打擾客人的生活時間｡若客人有需要我幫忙,雖時可說｡說中文或日文的,可直接溝通｡ 說英文的,請傳簡訊給我,我會用谷歌翻譯來看和回答｡ 交通方便!到東､西､南､北向都快,到安大略國際機場只要25分鐘｡ 離10號公路最近,約5個路口;到60號公路也不遠｡ 到迪士尼樂園只有17哩的距離｡ 公車站牌280就在我家出門走6棟房後,Azusa Ave大馬路口,左右都有｡ 280往南幾站,到Amar Rd轉480,搭到El Monte 公車總站,可換往四方向的公車｡ 280往南到Puente Hills Mall的公車總站,也能換很多不同路線的公車｡ 不要在房源內抽菸,因為菸味會很久才消,影響下ㄧ位客人｡ 不要在馬桶和浴缸､洗臉盆丟衛生紙､衞生棉和頭髮,因爲,此房下水道是陶瓷管,年代久了,前院大樹根由裂縫入侵,ㄧ有東西進去就阻塞,找專業通管,一次120元,若因此而堵管,要負責通水管的費用｡
neighborhood_overview: 交通方便!到東､西､南､北向都快,到安大略國際機場只要25分鐘｡ 離10號公路最近,約5個路口;到60號公路也不遠｡ 到迪士尼樂園只有17哩的距離｡
transit: 公車站牌280就在我家出門走6棟房後,Azusa Ave大馬路口,左右都有｡ 280往南幾站,到Amar Rd轉480,搭到El Monte 公車總站,可換往四方向的公車｡ 280往南到Puente Hills Mall的公車總站,也能換很多不同路線的公車｡

name: Tiny Home Studio in Los Angeles by Ventura Blvd
description: Now accepting month to month bookings! Lovely little studio with a tiny-home concept in mind within a quiet neighborhood of NoHo, Los Angeles Only minutes away from the cafes and restaurants of Ventura Blvd, Universal Studios, and a $10-$15 Uber away from the nightlife/tourist destinations of Hollywood, Downtown, and Santa Monica.  The space is perfect for travelers, foodies, and practitioners looking for a home-style space in Los Angeles while remaining close to the LA scene. The space has shared heavy duty sound-proof walls with the main residence. The studio has a separate entrance with coded locks to ensure you never have to formally check-in or check-out (but is required to be timely for check-outs, with the convenience of never having to hold onto keys). We are always a quick message or call away, and will usually have someone at the residence to assist as needed. Guests have access to a portion of the backyard for morning or evening coffee/tea. Always available over the phone, t
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood boasts mom and pop food destinations from Thai, Armenian, Indian, Mexican, and Korean cuisines. As well as great supermarkets for local shoppers and is conveniently located to both the Amtrak line as well as the LA Metro line. We are especially convenient for Burbank Airport travelers - about 10 minutes away by car.
transit: Uber, Rental Car, Bus, or Metro.

name: Gold-Diggers Hotel \|#6 Full Single
description: Room 6 Features a studio-style setup with hand-painted mural by Kristi Head, and a private two person balcony. Sit outside and flip tapes with our selection of cassettes and player just for this room. Rock and roll takes its toll... but you can sleep it off here. Gold-Diggers Hotel features 11 dreamy rooms. It's not unlike the perfect album: each room offers its own distinct vibe but all are unified by our idea of relaxation, comfort and retreat.  Your stay at the Gold-Diggers Hotel also includes hand-selected vinyl and vintage cassettes, as well as Sonos speakers so you can curate your own music experience, along with a limited edition Aquarium Drunkard x Gold-Diggers 12” vinyl mix--yours to keep. Music is the main fabric of our space, and we want you to enjoy it day and night. Speaking of fabrics, each hotel room has its own distinct personality, but they all deliver supreme comfort with cloud-like beds and supple linens. Welcome to your L.A. fantasy pad. 24 hrs. prior to check in yo
neighborhood_overview: Gold-Diggers is located in one of the most central and hip areas of Los Angeles, with dozens of the city’s best restaurants, shops, museums, hikes, and other activities right around the corner. For a full list of recommendations made by each member of the Gold-Diggers staff, please visit the Neighborhood section of our website (Website hidden by Airbnb)
transit: We highly encourage ride-sharing services such as Uber and Lyft however we do have offsite parking available for our Hotel guests. Simply ask your bartender for parking instructions upon check in.

name: ✅ Close to Disneyland, Shopping & ALL ATTRACTIONS
description: New remodeled home in beautiful city of Pico Rivera! 5 minutes WALK to restaurants, shopping centers & public transit bus. Easy access to 605 and 5 freeway, ideal for travelers who want a quieter place to stay but still in close proximity to all major attractions in LA & Orange County. (Disneyland/Knotts Berry Farm 15 miles, Seal Beach 20 miles, Downtown LA/Chinatown/Koreatown 10 miles, Hollywood/Universal Studios 18 miles, Beverly Hills 22 miles, Dodger Stadium 13 miles, LAX Airport 25 miles). LIVING ROOM - HD 50" SmartTV with digital streaming channels and WIFI - 2 sofabeds - 1 queen size self-inflating/deflating air mattress - Air conditioning unit BEDROOM #1 - 1 queen size bed with ultra-comfort 12" memory foam mattress - Extra sheets & blankets provided - Air conditioning unit BEDROOM #2 - 2 queen size beds with ultra-comfort 12" memory foam mattresses - Extra sheets & blankets provided - Air conditioning unit BEDROOM #3 - 1 full-size bed with ultra-comfort 12" memory foam mattres
neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of things to do for both residents and visitors alike. There are several shopping centers that have just about everything you could be looking for.  From major retailers to businesses that have been here for several years, it’s for certain you will find what you are looking for right here in Pico Rivera. If shopping has got you hungry, the City boasts a wide range of restaurants with different types of cuisine, from fast food to table service, your appetite will surely be satisfied.  If you need a moment to relax or want to take part in a class offered by the City, stop by one of our newly renovated parks. The City maintains over 120 developed acres of park space with everything from playgrounds to an Olympic size pool. There’s so much more to find and explore in Pico Rivera, from a 9-hole executive golf course to a Sports Arena hosting year round entertainment, no matter what your interests are, you are bound to find them here in Pico Rivera.
transit: Traveling with a car is not necessary. Many of my guests use UBER or LYFT or public transit bus and Metro which is only a short 5 minute walking distance. There are many variety of restaurants (American, Mexican, Chinese, Thai, A 5-star steakhouse, Pizza, Subway), supermarkets and grocery stores, liquor stores, 99 cents stores, all within 5-10 minute walking distance. Beautiful Smith Park with a huge kids playground is just 1 mile away. Super convenient location!

name: Unique Venice Beach Garden Retreat
description: This is NOT a condo, a townhouse, an apartment, a guest house, a loft, a cottage, a shared house or a rented space.  This is a stand-alone home on a lot twice the lot size of typical homes in Venice, with a beautiful sunny garden in the front & back and over 400 varieties of flowers and plants, minutes to Marina Del Rey, LAX Airport, Westwood, Beverly Hills & Hollywood. This home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and can sleep up to 6 people.  Bright, airy windows bring fresh ocean breeze into every room.  It's easy to enjoy many beautiful views of the flower-filled garden.  French doors from the dining room and master bedroom open to the large wrap-around deck overlooking the garden, providing wonderful, calming indoor/outdoor living.  The bright birch wood kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and has everything you could possibly need to create a gourmet meal.  Help yourself to fresh Meyer lemons and loquats outside your kitchen window, or take a short, pleasant walk
neighborhood_overview: There are so many wonderful things to enjoy nearby!  You will literally have your choice of nature, culture, all sorts of shopping, and much, much more just minutes away.   The beach is only a few minutes away and is perfect for surfing, sunbathing, wading, walking and more.  Don't miss out on browsing, biking or skating at the nearby Venice Beach Boardwalk and Santa Monica Pier.  At low tide, the Malibu tide pools are amazing, too!  Every taste will be satisfied at the surrounding restaurants, cafes, eateries, bakeries and coffee shops.   There are many venues to enjoy live music, theater and the arts.   Museums abound, and you can view treasures from ancient through modern eras.   Shops of every kind and price point are nearby, with tons of unique and interesting local stores,  (check out Abbott Kinney Street!)  multiple Farmer's Markets nearby throughout the week, as well as the fabled Rodeo Drive 20 minutes away and the neighborhood 99cent store for bargains.   Don't forget about t
transit: The local neighborhood is very walkable! You will find many lovely places to visit nearby.  Shopping and eateries are a pleasant walk away, and many of the places featured on the Airbnb Mar Vista travel guide are right around the corner!  LA offers many other transportation options as well.

name: Chill Out @ Amazing Mid-City GuestHouse w/Parking
description: Newly renovated 2BedRoom 1Bath Guesthouse, located in the heart of Los Angeles! Explore everything the city has to offer. Minutes to Beverly Hills, Hollywood, Downtown, Santa Monica, Culver City, LACMA, LAX and much more! Conveniently located within walking Distance to EXPO Light Rail train. Of course, No trip to SoCal would be complete without soaking up some rays on a private Balcony. Safe & secure, Includes Gated Parking for one car 2nd story unit (Located above garage) Private gated parking, can accommodate 1 car  Smart TV w/WIFI Full Size refrigerator Recently Remodeled Kitchen and Full Bathroom Ceiling Fans in bedrooms Hardwood Floors Gas Range Heater Chris and I are usually at work during business hours, however we like to greet all our guests at check in. When that isn't possible, we have self check in and pass-code available for front door and driveway gates. Our part of LA is bursting with DIVERSITY! Theres a great French bakery (Normandie Bakery) 5 min walk from the House wh
neighborhood_overview: Our part of LA is bursting with DIVERSITY! Theres a great French bakery (Normandie Bakery) 5 min walk from the House where you can sit people watch with a nice fresh pressed coffee and home made croissant. Baldwin Hills Scenic overlook is a 5 min drive, where you can get great views of the LA Basin, get a good workout on the steps while you're at it. The entrance to  Ballona Creek Bike Path is around the corner, where you can ride out to Marina Del Rey. Please check out out guidebook for additional recommended sight seeing locations, restaurants and attractions
transit: Mid City get its name for a reason. Centrally located 15 mins from Hollywood, LAX, Santa Monica and DTLA.  While its better to have a car when visiting LA, uber and Lyft are never more than 3 min wait.  Bird and Lyme Scooter peppered throughout neighborhood.  Walking distance to Expo Line Light Rail station with trips to Santa Monica Pier or DTLA

name: 恋家-蒙市高档套房独立洗手间A
description: 豪华大主人房.整栋房子一共四个房间.一楼一间.二楼三间..您所预定的这间在二楼.双洗手台干湿分离独立洗手间.阳光房.约40平米.独立衣帽间.全新家具.还有一张沙发床.最多可以住4个人.客厅.厨房.炊具..洗衣房是大家公的...Wendy为每一个房间的客人准备了自己的碗筷和橱柜...厨房定期清理...(但也希望您每次煮饭完毕自觉保持整洁)华人地区治安良好...附近华人超市走路15分钟..cvs.麦当劳.走路5分钟...周边很多华人餐厅...距离圣盖博医院开车10多分钟..嘉慧儿医院开车5分钟...家后院就有公园...可以爬山..走路十分钟可以到达蒙市出名的丁胖子广场...在这里您不用怕不会英文..百分之八十的中餐馆都在咱家附近...贼拉方便....如果您是赴美生子DIY提前跟我联系我为你准备baby床...婴儿浴盆等生活用品.Wendy有三年月子中心经验..也可以无偿帮您联系产科医生.帮您出医生预约单..也可推荐接送司机.考加州驾照.自驾租车等一系列服务.最后Wendy祝您旅途愉快. 街边免费停车 可以使用厨房,用完的餐具请自己手动清洗 入住时间2pm-11pm..入住前请提前联系... 邻近公园..华人区治安良好 步行11分钟到达公交车站.. 房间内禁止吸烟...请不要在夜晚再房间酗酒与大声喧哗...不接受airbnb以外的交易...建议在网站付款..谢谢..
neighborhood_overview: 邻近公园..华人区治安良好
transit: 步行11分钟到达公交车站..

name: Charming Los Feliz Apt w/ parking
description: Cool, light-filled, and comfortable one bedroom unit,  two blocks from the great restaurants, movie theaters, and boutique shops in Los Feliz Village.  Enjoy our Apple LCD TV flat screen and covered parking spot and walk up to Griffith Observatory! Cool, light-filled, and comfortable one bedroom unit,  two blocks from the great restaurants, movie theaters, and boutique shops in Los Feliz Village.  Enjoy our Apple LCD TV flat screen and covered parking spot and walk up to Griffith Observatory! Welcome to our very cute home-away-from-home in Los Feliz Village. Our apartment unit is in a quaint 1940s garden aparment building and tucked back in a residential neighborhood, but only a few blocks from Los Feliz Village along Vermont Avenue. The apartment is professionally cleaned and we have designed with comfort in mind.   APARTMENT FEATURES: • Covered Parking • Full Kitchen  • Full Size Refrigerator  • Free WiFi  • Wall mounted 42" LCD • Apple TV • New super-comfy deluxe Pillowtop Mattress
neighborhood_overview: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! Located just north of the Los Feliz Village shops, movie theater, and restaurants. Visit the weekly farmers market, catch a movie, and take a neighborhood stroll.  You can walk to Griffith Park and the Greek Theater or take a short ride up to the Griffith Observatory with its magnificent views of the whole LA basin. Los Feliz is an active, safe, and fun neighborhood right in the heart of the city but tucked up toward the hills, near Hollywood, next to Silverlake and Sunset Junction (with the city's best gelato, delicious Intelligentsia coffee, and boutique shops). Our apartment is perfect for a vacation, short stay or long stay.
transit: A covered parking spot is included with the unit. Plenty of convenient public transit! Take the metro all over the city!   • 15 minutes to downtown Los Angeles • 10-minute walk to Redline Metro subway station • Bus stop a block or less from the apartment • 10 min to Universal Studios • 10 min to Hollywood and the Hollywood Sign •  5 min to the LA Zoo •  5 min to the I-5 entrance and to the 101 Freeway •  5 minutes from Thai Town, Little Armenia, and great ethnic food.   •  5 min to Silverlake and Sunset Junction... • 3 min to Griffith park and the best hikes in LA •  3 min to Greek Theater and Griffith Observatory • 5 mins from 3 public golf courses and a driving range •  3 min from an organic grocery and regular supermarket, cafes, restaurants, movie theaters, hip boutiques, post office, and other important amenities. We could go on! • 20 minutes from the Burbank Airport

name: Secluded Getaway Retreat near JPL
description: Cute small cozy studio guest house with everything to make yourself at home.  We have high speed WiFi strong signal Internet connection at 60 mbps download speed. We have streaming media television player with all the channels ex: ESPN,  CNN, HBO. Very quiet and secluded hideaway back up near the forest near hiking trails and horse stables.  A nice place to call home for a quick stay or a longer business trip. Many people contact us and want to know how far of a drive it is to various places around the greater Los Angeles area.  I always direct people to use Gooogle Maps.  You can enter our zip code 91001 as the starting point and then enter your destination.  The map will display how many miles and approximate drive time in minutes.    Here are some examples:  91001 to Santa Monica:  31 miles / 1 hour drive in traffic Friday afternoon at 3:00 p.m. This is helpful if you are here for work or school and need to know how far away your destination is. Also, our studio is small.  It is a p
neighborhood_overview: Right up against the Angeles Forest and mountain trails yet so close to the city.  You will see riders on horseback and hear roosters in the morning!  Like living in the country but so close to the city.   And also very convenient close proximity to NASA JPL.  There is a small walkable trail that leads to the side gate of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory just a few minutes away.  Great if you are here visiting or interning at the facility.
transit: A bus stop is at the corner and we also recommend Lyft ride share service or taxicabs.

Use the private living room featuring TV and a fireplace, a private dining room for 6, and the bedrooms which share a bathroom featuring a separate shower and Jacuzzi tub. Our family includes myself, my husband and daughter and our flock of animals. Come on in The front part of the house (rental space) is separated from the rear, where the hosts live, via doors. You will have access to street parking in the front of the home. You will receive keys to front gate and front door upon check in. The front yard boasts newly done landscaping, a beautiful brick patio with Adirondack chairs and a lovely hammock under our sycamore trees. The front is primarily for guest; but all our animals can access this area and our rabbit, and guineas live o

Walking distance to a small neighborhood park, Starbucks, Gelsons Market, 711, a nice little coffee shop w/ gift store, Pizza, Thai, Vegan. Located within a mile of 101, 134, and 170 freeways which take you to all the sites. Easy access to public transit and about a mile to metro on Lankershim, off Chandler.
transit: We suggest renting a car if your planning to go to theme parks and the beach, but have plenty of easy accessible public transit near by. There are plenty of restaurant options in walking distance. We are within a mile of Ventura blvd, which is great for shopping, or eating. Within 5 miles we have a mall, movie theater, bowling alley, golf practice field, churches, parks, ymca, library. You name it, were near it.

name: Newly Renovated Valley Village Gem
description: An elegant yet comfortable family home with a European vibe, has a solar heated saltwater pool, minutes away from UNIVERSAL STUDIOS, HOLLYWOOD WALK OF FAME, HIKING TRAILS AND RODEO DRIVE in BEVERLY HILLS.  Great place to call home base when headed to BEACHES, MOUNTAINS and AMUSEMENT PARKS. Spacious ranch style home with pool, suitable for vacationing families and working professionals desiring a home-away-from-home.  Dining area and parlor make a great home-office. Modern communal kitchen with breakfast bar spilling into the living area with overstuffed down, custom-made furniture with OLED TV with HBO, Showtime, Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc. Sonos speakers allow you to tap into your own music library via smartphone. name: 1907 Craftsman Bungalow
description: Our home is on the National Register of Historic Places, located about 1.5 miles east of the Rose Bowl and 1.3 miles north of the Rose Parade route.  It has two bedrooms: one with a king sized bed and one with a queen. You'll have one off-street parking space for the duration of your visit, at the back of our home.  (Pasadena permit SRU (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) This listing is for travelers only (not filming).   Our home sleeps a maximum of 4 people. You'll have access to the entire house and yard.  Only the garage is off limits. When possible, we'll greet you in person and give you a quick walk-through, then leave you to make yourselves at home.  If you prefer not to be greeted, or we can't arrange to be home, we'll put out a lock-box for you to let yourselves in. Orange Heights was home to a number of the Pasadena's physicians, thus the neighborhood nickname of "Pill Hill".  Most of our neighboring homes have beautiful architecture and terraced yards.  Our street is lined wi
neighborhood_overview: Orange Heights was home to a number of the Pasadena's physicians, thus the neighborhood nickname of "Pill Hill".  Most of our neighboring homes have beautiful architecture and terraced yards.  Our street is lined with majestic Canary Palm trees, and there are views of the mountains between the trees. Although Pasadena has grown and changed, Orange Heights still appears today much as it did over ninety years ago.
transit: The LA Metro Gold Line (light rail) has a station on Lake Avenue, just over 1 mile away.  From there, you can easily get to downtown Los Angeles and historic Union Station.

name: Venice Beach Huge One Bedroom
description: Hi! Thanks for checking out my apartment. It is in the heart of Venice - half of a block from the beach, directly on Rose Ave. with easy access to restaurants, Abbott Kinney, the Venice Canals, etc. My place has a chic beachy vibe that is perfect for 2 guests looking for a local-feeling LA vacation. As a heads up, this is my primary residence so is lived in (has food in the pantry, clothes in the drawers), but I will leave space for you to unpack! Looking forward to hosting you. --Dan You have access to the entire apartment, except for back exit (I use the back mudroom to store personal items). I'm available via text 24/7 (except if I'm sleeping) (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Venice Beach is an amazing place, but has a significant homelessness problem. ALWAYS LOCK UP THE APARTMENT WHEN NOT HOME. Right outside my house are tons of ride-share companies as well as e-scooters and e-bikes that are fun for navigating Vencie.

name: 3BR/ 2BA/ 5 Beds L.A. Home
description: Completely remodeled in 2018. Modern 3 bedrooms, 5 beds, 2 full bathrooms with large deck home in a residential area. The property is located in the heart of Los Angeles in the neighborhood of Monterey- Rose Hills 5 minutes from Historic Highland Park bordering Pasadena. This home is also available for long term lease, ask host for details. Residential area of Monterey- Rose Hills. The home is part of a fourplex rear unit built in 2006  The entire property is gated.  Street parking is always available and it is free, fenced outdoor spaces. The other 3 units are Airbnb listings with their own private entrances and private outdoor spaces.  The property is located in Monterey-Rose Hills, 5 minutes from Historic Highland Park and bordering South Pasadena, El Sereno, and 15 minutes from Downtown Los Angeles. * walking distance from Ernest E. Debs Regional Park with impressive views of LA (great for a picnic, hiking, and running) - Large open living room, dining room, and kitchen  -3 bedroom
neighborhood_overview: Monterey-Rose Hills is located in the northeast of LA, which is rich with culture, art galleries, parks, bars, and restaurants. Debbs Park is great for hiking and is only walking distance from the house. Hermon Dog Park is only 3 minutes way (driving)
transit: This is Los Angeles so private transportation is highly recommended. However, we are only 5 minutes away (driving) from the Highland Park Gold Line Metro Station. Just a quick drive to the Gold Line Metro Station, park the car, and you can explore the city in the metro while avoiding the famous LA traffic. The Gold Line also connects to the FlyAway transportation system which goes to every terminal of the Los Angeles International Airport (LAX).  Buses #78 and #79 are 10 minutes away walking (1/2 mile). These two buses will take you straight to downtown Los Angeles and other connecting routes.

name: Cozy Studio minutes from the beach
description: My comfy little abode in the heart of Venice, is minutes from the beach with plenty of permit free street parking. Along with a separate bathroom and spacious kitchen for easy cooking, it'll make it easy to find your rhythm and make the space yours, feeling at home in no time. It's uniquely mine and I put a lot of love into it adding my own personal touches. It's been transformed a few times and it's grown along side me for many years now. If you're looking for an upmarket, modern apartment, you might be looking in the wrong place. The studio is modest, but very cozy and welcoming with a great energy! For bare basics, it has exactly what you need. My place is lovely and it'll be all yours if you choose to take it. No roommates, no one to answer to and no one to tip toe around. It's a small building with only 8 units. Unfortunately there aren't all the bells and whistles in terms of amenities, but we do have a laundry room in the building which is coin operated (coins not provided). Alt
neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood is quiet and very safe with lots of families. I love taking walks in the afternoon to connect with my it and the people around me. Venice has transformed quite a bit in the last few years, it's a turning into a great place to be and live.  The studio is 1.4mi from the infamous Venice Beach Boardwalk with an abundance of characters to feast your eyes on. If you like shopping, it's .86mi from the "new and improved" Abbot Kinney Blvd where you'll find a plethora of brand new eateries, bars and clothing stores to your hearts delight. The Santa Monica pier and 3rd Street Promenade are 3.8mi from your doorstep. If you're after the hustle and bustle of Hollywood, that's an "LA-quick" 40 min drive and a gorgeous drive up the PCH to Malibu and rustic Topanga Canyon is only 30 min in the opposite direction, with a number of hikes you can take that lead you to some spectacular views of the great Pacific.
transit: There are 4 bus stops going in all directions, just a block from the studio, which will take you anywhere you want to go in LA,  including the Metro stops in neighbouring Culver City and Santa Monica. If public transportation isn't your bag and you're dependent on a ride, Uber and Lyft is always easily accessible from anywhere in LA. If you have a car, parking is super easy on my street, but please keep your eyes peeled for the street signs and street cleaning days. Not only in the neighbourhood, but everywhere in LA... the traffic police wear "invisible cloaks" and at $73 per parking ticket, it can get pretty pricy when it starts to add up.

name: *Tropical Tiki Room* Centric, comfy & good vibes!
description: Welcome home! The Tropi-Tiki room is decorated with a tropical forest concept. The house spaces are consciously designed to feel relax, cozy and stress-free. I’m Caribbean native, and the island chill vibe is all over the house, is contagious and the Tiki room is no exception! ☀️ ⛄️  The house is located in the Powderhorn Park area, very centric and convenient location in Mpls. Whether you are vacationing, working or just visiting, I guarantee you will have a great Tiki experience as my guest! The house is very welcoming and decorated in such way to create a peaceful, cozy and contemporary ambience. The arts in the walls were created by local and international artists from previous trips. The house also has a backyard and bonfire pit available (except during winter). Upon your stay, I will also provide maps, recommendations and the necessary information to make your travel as pleasant as possible. I’ve created a personalized travel guide for you. If you are interested in anything in pa
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood has a little bit of everything and everybody, it's mostly residential, but you will find coffee shops such as Cafe Southside, May Day Cafe, Modern times, etc. The Mid-Town Exchange is at walking distance,  art galleries such as The Porch Gallery (one block away), and Modus Locus are nearby as well. There's also food shops, churches, local shops, and the Powderhorn Park! But the best part is the community itself; this is what I like the most about living here; neighbors are cool, people are friendly and very community-oriented. In fact, if you’re into rock and guitars, Prince was born and lived his early years a couple of blocks from this house. The neighborhood is vibrant and has an artistic movement where, if you decide to explore it, you will find various spaces full of unique expression and identity. It’s also one of the most bike friendly neighborhoods in the city (note: Mpls was ranked #1 bike city in the US 2018).
transit: Very convenient location! My place is less than 2 miles south from downtown (USBank Stadium, Convention Center, etc), 2 miles west from Uptown, 4.5 miles north east from the airport and 6 miles north from Mall of America.  There are 2 main bus stops 3 blocks away, Route 5 and 11 will take you to MOA, downtown, Convention Center, Target Field, USBank, Nicollet Mall, etc. Additionally, there's plenty of parking space outside the house. Uber/lyft rides to downtown, Convention Center, USBank Stadium, Target Stadium and museums go from $7-$10.

name: Treetop guest apartment by the lake
description: Amazing private unit located steps from Bde Maka Ska (formerly Lake Calhoun) with biking, running & walking paths, beaches, 6 blocks from Linden Hills, 1 mile to Uptown. Great walkability with shopping, restaurants, wine bars, Lake Harriett bandshell, rose garden, peace garden and farmers markets all nearby. Only 5 miles from downtown Minneapolis. Full kitchen, dining & living room. Bedroom features a large private deck. This unit has a separate entrance and occupies the entire second story. Electronic door lock allows easy access through separate entrance. Plenty of street parking right in front of the house. name: Sunny Uptown Penthouse
description: Penthouse suite located within a clean, quiet building right in the heart of Uptown - easy access to downtown, too. Fits two comfortably. Private rooftop access with full patio set! Just blocks from Lakes Bde Maka Ska & Isles, and the Hennepin Avenue/Lake Street restaurants, bars and retail. Unbeatable location - within walking distance of all Uptown has to offer. You are the only one with access to the rooftop of the entire building - perfect for hanging out on beautiful Minneapolis summer days. Whole apartment is yours: spacious common area with queen-sized bed, private bathroom, full kitchen, and (weather permitting) rooftop patio! Lake Calhoun is a popular destination for running/biking or just hanging out. Two gyms (LA Fitness & YWCA), Corepower Yoga, liquor store, grocery store, hair/nail salons all within walking distance.  Barbette (French) and Amore Victoria (Italian) restaurants both on the block, with fun gastropub Lake & Irving a half block up and several other restaurants
neighborhood_overview: Lake Calhoun is a popular destination for running/biking or just hanging out. Two gyms (LA Fitness & YWCA), Corepower Yoga, liquor store, grocery store, hair/nail salons all within walking distance.  Barbette (French) and Amore Victoria (Italian) restaurants both on the block, with fun gastropub Lake & Irving a half block up and several other restaurants nearby. Happy to provide additional restaurant recommendations and other info at your request!
transit: Free parking lot behind building. 8-10 min. driving distance from most downtown locations and easy freeway access.  Within five minutes walking of stops for bus routes 6, 17 & 21. 1 block from the Greenway, a bike trail that connects to downtown and other parts of the city. Nice Ride bike sharing program available.

Minutes from downtown Minneapolis, Airport, Mall of America, US Bank Stadium and the Guthrie.  Ideal for late or early flights from either airport.  Great neighborhood with friendly neighbors. Space has an electric fireplace for those chilly Minnesota winters.  Comfortable queen size bed with down comforter, WiFi and streaming. We have a dog named Johnny Cash.  She would love to spend time with you and will probably whine at your door after I leave for work in the morning.  I usually close the door to the upstairs to avoid Johnny going upstairs. Guests can access the patio, fire pit area and gas grill.  Use of kitchen, laundry and dining room. I’m available for questions and enjoy interacting with guests. Close to Th

name: Beautifully renovated 1-bedroom condo in Uptown
description: The building is on a quiet street in a wonderful neighborhood (Uptown Minneapolis) and there are plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance. It is a very desirable location because of the proximity to downtown (only a 5-10 minute drive depending on traffic). The condo has all the amenities you could need-full kitchen, bathroom, separate bedroom and access to laundry facilities. You can use the free WiFi and watch Netflix to your hearts desire! This is an older building! It was built in 1912 and has the charm to prove it. The location is really unbeatable because you have so many delicious food options within just a few blocks. And there’s plenty of places to grab a local craft brew! I have a cat, so I will mention it might not work if you have a bad allergy. The cat will obviously not be staying at the condo, but I’m sure his hair is in the cracks of the floor! So yeah.. other than that, it’s a beautiful space and I personally have put a lot of work into it and take a lot
neighborhood_overview: I really do love uptown. If you’re not familiar with it, it’s kind of a bar scene on the weekends. My place, however is a few blocks off the main drag so you won’t have any noise or anything. We have a really cute little shopping area here. If you wander down Nicollet Ave just a mile or so you’ll find a bunch of local shops and places to pop into (it’s called eat street for a reason). But yeah you’re also a 5 minute Uber from downtown.
transit: It’s so easy to get anywhere around here. If you do have a car, I don’t have off-street parking but parking on the street in front of the house has absolutely never been an issue. There are always plenty of spaces.

name: The Red House Uptown Minneapolis
description: Artsy 2-bedroom in Uptown. Steps away from great restaurants, boutiques, galleries and more.  The Red House Uptown Minneapolis is a first-floor unit in a duplex. The upstairs is rented by longterm tenants who are friendly, respectful & wonderful people.   Dog friendly (1 dog - over 2 years old, less than 25 pounds. Your dog must be kept in crate when you go out. Message Kelly for pre-approval of your pet. This is our only AirBnB. Kelly lives 2 miles away and maintains it herself. Artists’ Duplex in Uptown Minneapolis House at 910 West 31st Street Cozy first floor of Uptown Minneapolis duplex. Entire apartment filled with light and original art. There are high ceilings and lots of wood trim with hand-crafted, traditional character. Choose The Red House Uptown Minneapolis for our location, steps away from many great restaurants, coffee shops, galleries, bars and more.  We are family friendly, with toys, games and kids books. Bryant Square Park is down the street. Owner lives down the str
neighborhood_overview: Uptown Minneapolis has so many great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, live theatre, art galleries, bike paths, parks, lakes, shopping... It's really enjoyable to be here. We live on 31st street which has a lovely wide boulevard lined with trees making walking down to Bde Maka Ska pleasant.  We love walking to grab groceries, take-out food from Amazing Thailand, being able to walk to Calhoun Square or the Apple Store and not worry about parking.
transit: We are steps away from the Metro Transit stop for the 4 bus. It will take you downtown. Jamie and I usually catch the 4 when we go out to see live music, then we get a taxi/uber/lyft home. One block away, you can catch the 21 bus on Lake Street which will take you to the Midtown Station where you catch the Blue Line downtown. Find out more by googling metro transit. If you bring a car (let me know) you can park in the back on the asphalt - there is room for one vehicle. If it's a busy Saturday night, and parking is tight, you can usually find a spot within a half-block.

name: Linden Hills Luxury with Rooftop Deck
description: Delight yourself with an amazing and relaxing experience by choosing to spend your time in Minneapolis at our gorgeous and modern designer home.  This beautiful home is stylishly decorated with a contemporary style and an intelligent use of the space.  The home is furnished luxuriously and is ideally suited for up to 7 guests. Perfect for families and groups - it features all the home comforts and no matter what you are into, you're bound to find something great here! From the minute you arrive you will be embraced by the warm ambiance and airiness of the space, the neat furniture, the thoughtful amenities and the sparkling cleanliness to which we are highly committed. Sleek, modern and spacious  are the main aspects that define this space which has been tailored to provide you with a stay beyond your imagination. The house has an open and comfortable vibe with natural light against the custom high-end finishes and vaulted ceilings. Stretch out with friends or family for a movie night
neighborhood_overview: Minneapolis may be located in the Bold North but don’t confuse that with the cold north! Minnesota is a warm and welcoming place full of adventure and nice people. Don’t be fooled by the weather, Minnesota is a beautiful place filled with multiple activities for big and small. Enjoy our conveniently located house near Lake Harriet, Calhoun, and Linden Hills. Popular buzzing 50th & France is walking distance away! The neighbourhood is safe, fun and friendly with great neighbours. The house is walking distance from a variety of shops, bars, and restaurants. Find yourself swimming in Lake Harriet or kayaking in Lake Calhoun. Minneapolis is biker friendly and there are dockless bike stations located around the city. Have a fun weekend getaway with friends or pamper yourself in our wonderful home! Come experience what “Minnesota Nice” is all about.
transit: Many restaurants, bars, shopping, and lakes in walking distance! There is parking on the property for up to four vehicles (2 in the garage and 2 in the driveway)! Uber/Lyft Whether you’re riding to work, taking your #1 for a night on the town, or anything in between, count on Lyft for a ride in minutes. The Lyft app matches you with local drivers in just a few taps. Request, ride, then simply pay in the app. Uber is the best way to get around Minneapolis - St. Paul. Download the app and get a ride in minutes. PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION  Busses and trains are both convenient and equally priced.  The only differences between the two are the areas serviced.  The fares are $2.25 peak fare, and $1.75 off peak for local buses and all trains and $2.25 off-peak and $3.00 peak for express buses. A day pass is available for $6 and is valid for both busses and trains.  For route and schedule information visit the Metro Transit Website - or TripGo for a comparison of all your transport options, combini

It boasts original wood floors, built in, pocket doors, and boxed ceiling in the dining room, and a large walkout front porch. The kitchen is fully updated with new appliances and granite countertops. You will have access to your private room and to the shared kitchen, dining room, living room, front porch, and bathroom. The common areas are shared with two other Airbnb rooms. There is also ample free street parking. We, your hosts live right across the street so if you need anything, we are just a stones throw away. We are most available in the late mornings and early evenings. We are within less than a mile and within walking distance to downtown, US Bank Stadium, Abbott Northwestern Hospital, Children's Hospital, HCMC, and the Convention Center. We are just a couple miles from the center of the University of Minnesota, Uptown, Lake Calhoun, Lake Harriet, Lake of the Isles, and Lake Nokomis.  We love good food, so we c
neighborhood_overview: We are within less than a mile and within walking distance to downtown, US Bank Stadium, Abbott Northwestern Hospital, Children's Hospital, HCMC, and the Convention Center. We are just a couple miles from the center of the University of Minnesota, Uptown, Lake Calhoun, Lake Harriet, Lake of the Isles, and Lake Nokomis.  We love good food, so we can also point you in the direction of local eating hot spots.   We love our neighborhood.  So much so, that we bought another home right across the street where we are raising our three daughters. We appreciate its diversity and vibrancy and how centrally located it is to the entire metro!!   Because we are in the heart of the city, we get to experience people from broad cultural and economic backgrounds in a densely populated area.  Our neighborhood, Ventura Village, is a part of the most diverse neighborhood in the entire country with over 100 languages spoken here!  There are restaurants, healthcare buildings, old Victorian homes, apartment

name: Boho Penthouse Nest in Quaint Nordeast - WiFi
description: A cozy, welcoming home with all you need, in a prime part of NE Mpls! Home to eclectic artists, lots of new craft breweries & pub crawls, an ethnic eating strip, retro shops, cafes, live music, parks ! Close to downtown, freeways, bus lines, etc ! Welcome to my upper 1 bedroom apartment, ready for your stay in NE Minneapolis.  This is a duplex house with a FULL kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, living room, and great backyard garden - not just a room, or apartment in an apartment building.    One of the best things about the house is that it's located, very conveniently between Mpls and St. Paul - A few miles from the U of M and just 5 minutes from downtown Minneapolis!  Freeway entrance is just a couple blocks away. One block from a major bus route and 15 minutes from the airport and Mall of America.  Lots of shops within walking distance and more within short biking distance. Great location.       House Description: My quiet and cozy one bedroom home can be yours to call your own while you
neighborhood_overview: The area:       Welcome to NE Minneapolis! Coming to town to tour our incredible NE Minneapolis breweries? Or for theater, farmers markets, or our great local Arts events? A business convention?  Or to visit nearby relatives? NE Minneapolis is a convenient, centrally located, yet safe, residential spot for your homebase. It's artsy, quaint, and full of neighborhood bars and restaurants, many of them with acclaimed chefs and locally grown ingredients!  Pub crawls are very popular in NE because it's so easy to walk from one bar to the next, and each has its own individual flavor.  The neighborhood is all residential with tree-lined sidewalks. A short, 1 block walk to restaurants and 2 blocks to a major grocery store and Target store, etc. There is a large park with wading pool, tennis courts, soccer/ice skating just one block from the house. Freeway entrances are only 3 blocks away making the location really ideal and quick to get to any other part of the city. It's a 5 minute drive to d
transit: There is a major bus route a block from the house and a very handy website for metro transit to help you plan your route. Also, nearby are bikes available for rent and Uber/Lyft are very common in Minneapolis.  The light rail line is ever-expanding and will get you quickly to the airport, downtown, or Mall of America area.. and now to St. Paul too! You’ll need to take a cab, drive or ride a bike to get to the lightrail, fyi.

description: Our gorgeous, cozy, and antique Tudor home is located in North Minneapolis. Stylish living spaces, butcher block counters, your own fridge, and a beautiful deck are key features. We're a quick drive to Northeast breweries and trendy restaurants. Multiple grocery stores and bus lines are within walking distance, and the Mississippi River view is a short drive! If you'd like to experience how Mpls locals live, look no further! - Beautiful Tudor style home - Stylish living spaces - 1 Gig high speed wifi - Fully functioning kitchen with cookware, utensils, and private mini fridge - Coffee time! Keurig coffee machine, tea kettle, and mugs. - Cast iron tub and shower - Washer and dryer available - A furnished patio Guests have access to first floor living, dining, bath, and kitchen spaces. We have a stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, your own mini-fridge, dryfood and basement storage space, and a set of laundry machines. It's up to you. We live upstairs and our guests can have as much or as
neighborhood_overview: We live in a family-oriented neighborhood with schools, parks, gas stations, and grocery stores near by. Conveniently, located near to northeast and downtown. Our favorite thing to do is to explore the Northeast arts district across the Mississippi river. Check out our historic and iconic sites, such as the Walker Museum, Betty Dangers restaurant and it's famous ferris wheel, and St. Mary's Basilica. We're only a five minute drive from these spots.
transit: Driving is more convenient as we live near highway I-94, but we have several bus rapid transit lines close by as well. There are bus stops, scooters, and nice ride bikes every few blocks. In the summer, our neighborhood is a great area to bike around with parks and restaurants near by.

It is a five minute walk from tons of great local bars, restaurants, co-ops that are located all along Lyndale. The Walker Art Center and the Sculpture Garden are also just a short walk. About a fifteen minute walk and you're in Uptown Square where Lyndale and Lake street meet. Here there are more bars and restaurants as wells as shops and the beautiful Lake Bde Maka Ska. It is just a five minute drive to Downtown Minneapolis on the Lyndale or Franklin Ave to First Ave. Its also walk-able and will take about twenty five minutes.
transit: Very quick driving access to I-94 and 394. There is a bus stop half a block up on the corner of Franklin and Lyndale where you can hope on the 4 or the 6 and get to downtown in minutes. Buses to Target Field and Target Center can also be boarded here. There are also several express buses to the U of M. The 113 takes about 7 minutes to get there.
