name: Private Studio in Seattle
description: ***No smoking on the premises*** Cozy private studio apartment. Maple Leaf neighborhood. Peaceful oasis near all Seattle has to offer. Off street parking, easy walk to bus lines and cafes. Near UW and Green lake. Stay in and surf the net, or watch cable TV. Family friendly location. This is a light, bright space close to everything.  Comfortable for a short stay or a longer one, it has a full kitchen, washer & dryer in room.  Gas heater keeps the room snug and quiet in the winter. Fans keep it cool in the summer. Look out of the large windows to the shared yard with its outdoor picnic seating. Off street parking. Private bathroom. Private kitchen with oven, microwave, full sized fridge, and sink. Free WiFi Free Cable TV 48" flat screen (with some premium channels) Coffee and Tea, and some light snacks. Coffee Maker Dishes, pans, plates, etc... Private washer and dryer, laundry soap included Shared Yard Shared outdoor dining table Hair Dryer Plenty of spare linens and towels. Shampoo, c
neighborhood_overview: Maple Leaf is a family-friendly neighborhood just north of the University of Washington. It's characterized by its location close to everything - the marvelous Green Lake park, Northgate Mall, the dynamic Roosevelt corridor, and so much more.
transit: Bus lines 66 and 67 will get you downtown, or, the 10 minute walk up to the park and ride will get you anywhere you need to go.  We also have off-street parking if you have a car.

name: Spectacular View Master Suite
description: Spectacular views are just part of this luxury suite's magic and what makes staying in it a truly unique experience. Located on the third floor, this grand 1,000 sqft master suite includes a king bed, sitting/tv area, patio and kitchenette.  Designed by famed architect Arthur Loveless, the house was built in 1909 in the grandest style of the day by shipping magnate H.B. Kennedy. Its rich history includes a Hollywood turn as a location in filming the popular 1993 movie Sleepless in Seattle. This unique offering is a private 1,000 sqft master suite in the upscale North Admiral neighborhood of West Seattle. Guests enter through the front entrance of the home and climb the grand stairway to the third floor where the private master suite has its own locked entrance. The home blends the charms of yesteryear with modern comforts. The space includes an enormous 3rd floor master suite (over 1,000 sq ft) that is well-appointed for relaxation. The suite features a king-size bed with luxury linens
neighborhood_overview: Located on aptly named Sunset Avenue in the delightful West Seattle North Admiral neighborhood. It is walking distance to many restaurants, cafes, shops, a movie theater and a library, in addition to beautiful Alki Beach.  Just a few minutes drive to the West Seattle Bridge for access to downtown Seattle and freeways.
transit: - #55 bus route to West Seattle Junction and downtown Seattle. - Free shuttle stop to West Seattle water taxi to downtown Seattle. - 2 miles from West Seattle Junction. - 0.2 miles from Alki beach. You can walk to the beach and restaurants. - 6 miles from downtown Seattle

name: Funky City Escape
description: The space is a lower level mother-in-law unit of a bustling house of artists. Private entrance & a front patio space with a swinging bench, table, & chairs. The kitchen is equipped with a stove top, refrigerator, large sink, utensils, a pot & pan, knives & utensils. There’s a small breakfast nook to eat at. It is good for the basics & take out! The bathroom is small & sweet, with a claw foot tub & plenty of hot water. Cozy studio-style bedroom with Casper mattress. Location is amazing!! The main house occupies multiple active residents. This unit is on the lower level, there will be some noise occasionally from the main house. If you are a light sleeper, let us know in advance & we will do our best to coordinate & be extra quiet. If you are sensitive to noise, this is not the right match. I’m around & happy to meet with guests, but only if you request it. It really is a city escape - so close to great sightseeing, nightlife, and Seattle culture, yet tucked away in a quiet neighborhood.
neighborhood_overview: It really is a city escape - so close to great sightseeing, nightlife, and Seattle culture, yet tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. I’m happy to give some recommendations of where to eat, what to see, & how to navigate.
transit: We’re on a bus line straight into the city. Lyft, Uber & taxis are easily available. Plenty of free, 24/7 parking space.

name: Private West Seattle Guest Cottage
description: Welcome to our Casita! We have a cozy studio, detached guest house behind our home, yet enclosed within our property, in the heart of The Admiral District of West Seattle. Grocery stores, coffee, restaurants are a block away. A city bus stop is conveniently located on the corner. The house has easy access to Sea-Tac airport, downtown Seattle, Alki Beach, The Junction and all the amenities of West Seattle and the surrounding area. No Kitchen. The guest house is a newly renovated detached guesthouse in our backyard facing the main house. It's perfect for a single traveller or couple.  There is a private entrance and access to the Alley that is a 1/2 block out to all ammenities making it easy for you come and go without needing to engage. If you feel like sitting outside, however, we have a lovely outdoor area to enjoy that is shared with home owners. Inside the casita, you will enjoy an updated, renovated full bath and living quarters that include a full (futon) bed, ample racks and shel
neighborhood_overview: Admiral is a typical lively and urban Seattle neighborhood that offers the beauty of all that is the Pacific Northwest. Coffee, local merchants, farmers markets on Sundays in the Alaska Junction 1 mile south, Alki beach a 10 minute walk, international food, and great places to have a glass of cheer are everywhere. Come enjoy!
transit: Street parking is very easy. There is a bus stop to downtown half a block away. Two blocks away, you can catch the bus to West Seattle Water Taxi, a pedestrian boat that takes you across Elliott Bay to downtown Seattle. This shuttle bus is also good for a free ride down to Alki Beach. You can walk one block to grocery stores, coffee, and restaurants. We are an easy UBER ride from and to the airport. Driving anywhere north or south is simple as you can hop on I-5 with ease.
